title: The Path to Violence - Lessons from Mass Shootings (FBI's Threat Assessment Center)
description:
The FBI's Threat Assessment Center is tasked with preventing tragedies. And they need the help of the public to be successful. Let's learn about what to look for.

Follow Frank on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1
